page.title: 05Recreation
page.content: {Recreation}in our area This is how to play "Best Man Dead": Someone goes on it and the players take turns to "die".You have a choice from:machinegun;hand grenade;fire; assassination;dagger,etc. The person who dies most dramatically or whose "death" was done in a funny way wins,and goes on it.The person who is on it delivers the weapons.He throws the grenade,the dagger and the bowling ball and then fires the machine gun,the magnum,the bazooka,the poisoned dart and the arrow then drives the tank and the bus (that knocks people over) This is the best{game}we{play}in the{school playground. by Andrew Beaney.
